snippet: Ms. Barton displayed her dramatic, voluptuous voice with songs by Dvorak and Chausson in a recital at Zankel Hall.
abstract: Corinna da Fonseca-Wollheim reviews performance by mezzo-soprano Jamie Barton at Zankel Hall.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Barton displayed her dramatic, voluptuous voice with songs by Dvorak and Chausson in a recital at Zankel Hall.

headline.main: Review: Jamie Barton Shows That She’s a Powerhouse of a Mezzo-Soprano
headline.print_headline: The Power of Love and Lungs
